Chapters: 0:00 - Panel focus on scaling AI agents responsibly with architecture, model choices, governance, and trust 00:12:00 - Human-in-the-loop AI design ensuring expert training and decision oversight 00:15:16 - Shift toward live demos and interactive prototypes over static presentations 00:16:24 - Transition to architectural discussion of AI agent implementation 00:23:33 - Choosing and Evaluating AI Models in Microsoft Foundry 00:24:18 - Multi-Model Strategy: Matching Models to Specific Use Cases 00:37:02 - Architecting systems with autoscaling, fault tolerance, and observability 00:38:07 - GPU scaling complexities and model failover strategies 00:41:27 - Key advice for AI adoption: platform reuse, iterative prototyping, and focusing on outcomes
